name: performance-benchmark
description: k6 is a code centric tool for load testing, performance monitoring and chaos/reliability testing. This repository contains some scenarios that are supposed to be run against the test-datahub of the city of Ulm in Germany. Each scenario has its own `js` file within the [`k6`](./k6) folder. Most scenarios consist of multiple sub-scenarios changing a single variable like the amount of parallel requests.
